attributes.action: protect the rights of the British people to celebrate traditional occasions without the fear of insulting other cultures.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In my opinion we risk losing our national identity, not through multi-culturism but through the do-gooders who are trying to protect the 'rights' of other cultures who in the main have no objections to such things as Christmas and the flying of the English Flag.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "protect the rights of the British people to celebrate traditional occasions without the fear of insulting other cultures."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11332.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Protectidentity/
